document.full_text: oops! the promotional blitz for britney spears latest album got off to a rough start on tuesday when spanish heartthrob enrique iglesias denied that he would go on tour with the pop starlet.
document.title: enrique iglesias not touring with britney spears
lines_and_colors: oops! the promotional blitz for britney spears latest album got off to a rough start on tuesday when spanish heartthrob enrique iglesias denied that he would go on tour with the pop starlet.
